message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're interested in the product but $90 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $95. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. While I understand your perspective, I still believe I should only pay up to $85 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
